column5: One more final test on Tuesday, then I'm off to Xmas holiday! Havn't fished since the Salmon were kicking.  I'm pretty new to trib fishing, especially this time of the year. With the high temps and rain today and yesterday. The tribs should have a good flow of current to break the ice? I plan to fish Wed cause on Tues the rivers are probably too blown-up? What are some of the good colour flies I should bring?
